text: walaqad 'ursil allah 'iilaykum alnby alkarim yusif bin yaequb ealayhima alsalam min qibal mwsa, baldlayl alwadihat ealaa sdqh, wamrkm bieibadat allah wahdah la sharik lh, fama ziltum mrtabyn mimaa ja'akum bih fi hyath, hataa 'iidha maat aizdad shkkm wshrkkm, wqltm: 'iina allah ln yursil min baedih rswla, mithl dhlk aldalal yudill allah kl mtjawz llhq, shakk fi whdanyt allah teala, fala ywfqh 'iilaa alhudaa walrshad
